news.title: ‘What we went through was horrific’ – families angry after Swiss clinic helped Irish woman to die in secret despite its promises
news.summary: Two families whose loved ones ended their lives at a Swiss clinic in secret have said they are heartbroken that another family has been put through a similar ordeal.

news.title: Ireland squad for Women’s Rugby World Cup announced with ex-England prop Ellena Perry included
news.summary: Ireland head coach Scott Bemand has announced his final 32-player Women’s Rugby World Cup squad for the tournament in England which starts on Friday, August 22.

news.title: Man killed in Downpatrick named and priest remains in hospital after ‘brutal attack’ that police believe may be linked
news.summary: A man in his 50s killed in Downpatrick over the weekend has been named locally as Stephen Brannigan.

news.title: Five Al Jazeera journalists killed in Israeli strike in Gaza; Australia to recognise Palestinian state at UN
Pat Spillane: My bugbears and random thoughts post-Championship 2025 – and why the GAA could do a lot better
news.summary: The week after an All-Ireland final win is always very special in Kerry. And while it may have been the 39th title, believe me, they celebrated the latest All-Ireland success with the same enthusiasm, the same atmosphere and the same feel-good factor as always.

news.title: More than a third of people injured in e-scooter crashes in Ireland have drugs or drink in their systems, study finds
news.summary: The presence of alcohol and drugs in patients involved in falls and collisions from e-scooters has doubled while use of helmets has decreased since e-scooters were legally allowed to be driven on public roads last year, new research shows.

news.title: Vogue Williams: ‘I’m a giant and guys aren’t attracted to that’
news.summary: With a tanning range, a children’s clothing line and her new memoir,  Big Mouth , just released, Vogue Williams sure knows a thing or two when it comes to business.

news.title: Ask Allison: I have a nudist fantasy my wife is not interested in – and it’s growing. What should I do?
news.summary: Question:  I’m a middle aged man in a normal relationship with two kids. We have a pretty normal life, busy with kids’ activities, work, housework, etc. We do get away and our sex life is pretty healthy. And I am still really attracted to my wife.

news.title: Oasis in Edinburgh: A muggy, boozy squall of euphoria – shame we missed the dress code
news.summary: Three enormous cars emerge from a stadium tunnel. A long silver ­people-carrier. Two dark jeeps. They roll slowly towards a huge stage, hazards blinking

news.title: Boost for parents as extra daily hour of free pre-school on table for Budget 2026
news.summary: A daily one-hour extension of free pre-school attendance could be on the way, in a planned significant boost to young parents in Budget 2026.
